import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';export default function usePoller(fn,delay){var savedCallback=useRef();// Remember the latest fn.
useEffect(function(){savedCallback.current=fn;},[fn]);// Set up the interval.
useEffect(function(){function tick(){savedCallback.current();}if(delay!==null){var id=setInterval(tick,delay);return function(){return clearInterval(id);};}},[delay]);//run at start too
